alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:30PM CDT until March 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN ADAIR AND NORTHEASTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Proctor, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Eldon... Proctor... Baron... Christie... Maryetta... Scraper... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
